participant_2.background:
I need to find a way to balance my love of binge watching with my need to focus on my art.
I like to watch The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs.
i am in a lot of debt.
I moved to Los Angeles from Tokyo and my brothers helped me a lot, so I am making lunch for them to show my appreciation.
My family, even if my parents don't always understand me.

content.text: Hello there, I'm Akari, it's nice to meet you!
It's nice to meet you too Akari! What do you enjoy doing?
I enjoy many things, I like to binge watch shows, and also do some art on the side.
Oh that's really cool! What kind of shows do you like to watch?
I like to watch a lot of different things, but my favorite show right now is called The Repair Shop, it's really inspiring.
I've never heard of that one, what's it about?
It's about a group of people who restore old items, it's really interesting to see how they take something old and turn it into something new.
That sounds really cool, I'll have to check it out! I love seeing people do creative things.
It's a really good show, I hope you like it! What do you like to do for art?
I like to paint, I'm not very good at it, but it's fun to do.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to try painting, but I'm not very good at it either.
Well, if you ever want to try painting together, I'd be happy to help!
That would be so fun! I love meeting new people who share my interests.
Me too! I'm glad I met you, Akari.
